column2: Hi. Good morning. I'm looking for Charles. Alright. Thank you. So anyway....Charles....this is Billy from Medicare. I and I'm just calling you regarding some recent changes made in most medical plans. And this year....it brings new health plans and R coverage options....and you are eligible to lower down your medication costs and you can get your own dental vision and hearing coverage in a $0 premium or at no cost to you. So I just want to know Mr Low....Uh....does your Medicare parts A and B are currently active this year. OK....great. So....aside from Medicare....do you also have your own private advantage plan? Like from Humana or Blue Cross Blue Shield A RP humana. OK. And also....are you getting some co pays deductibles or even a coinsurance from Humana? So how much are you currently spending....sir? With

for the medication....that is $3. Ok....All right. So now....to make sure that you are receiving this upgraded benefits and you can save more money on your medical plan together with you....man....I will have one of our licenced medical advisor on the other line to discuss to you some policy breakdown review so that you'll be....uh....informing up to date on your Medicare benefits and coverage. And also just to make sure that you are aware of the new changes with supplemental benefits that have taken place....which can provide you those premium benefits cost saving plans....lower monthly premiums and also for the reduction on your Medicare part. B deductibles. OK....so....Mr Low....I also be needing your date of birth. So when is your birthday?
30. Ok....thank you. Ok....all right. Thank you so much. So I want you to stay on the line and then I will connect you over now to one of our licenced medical expert. Ok....All right. Thank you.
